entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 06:02 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
